options.title: Electives
options.description: Complete 8 units of computer science and 8 units of electrical and computer engineering upper-division electives.

options.title: Technical Breadth
options.description: Complete three technical breadth courses (12 units) from an approved list available in the Office of Academic and Student Affairs

options.title: Capstone Design
options.description: Complete eight units from one of the following groups:

options.title: Systems Design
courses: EC ENGR 180DA - Systems Design
EC ENGR 180DW - Systems Design

options.title: Design of Robotic Systems
courses: EC ENGR 183DA - Design of Robotic Systems I
EC ENGR 183DB - Design of Robotic Systems II
